CustomField.description: **System Calculated/Override** The source Invoice Line record that generates the transaction line. The transaction line record inherits the Revenue GL Account related to the Item on the source Invoice Line record
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated/Override** The source Invoice Line record that generates the transaction line. The transaction line record inherits the Revenue GL Account related to the Item on the source Invoice Line record
CustomField.label: Invoice Line
